title: The Art Exchange (August 19–21)
short_description: Visitors of all ages are invited to stop by the Ryan Learning Center and explore a variety of activities.
list_description: Visitors of all ages are invited to stop by the Ryan Learning Center and explore a variety of activities.
description:
Visitors of all ages are invited to stop by the museum’s Ryan Learning Center and choose from a variety of activities: create an art project, explore the Multisensory Gallery, make a custom museum tour with JourneyMaker, and more.

See all upcoming dates for the Art Exchange.

Studio projects in the Art exchange have been designed with social distancing in mind. Parties of visitors will be physically separated from each other, and each party will work with a separate set of supplies.

The space will close for 15 minutes periodically to refresh art materials and maintain cleanliness.
